Name: RunVR
About the game: Experience the best way of moving through the virtual world. Swing your arms to run around, jump, slide, and climb your way through obstacles. Climb up buildings, rock climbing walls, and race to the finish line for the best time. Features: Running, jumping, sliding, and climbing in VR through an obstacle course. Very intuitive and low motion sickness.
